sentences.en: Even if it is a fantasy or an illusion, so long as it shows a ray of hope it still urges you on in pursuit of that little sparkle without letup.
sentences.cn: 不管是望梅止渴，还是画饼充饥，他都会激励你不停手中的浆，去追逐哪怕一星微小的火光。

sentences.en: They pressed on without letup until they got to the top of the hill.
sentences.cn: 他们一鼓作气爬上山顶.

sentences.en: We must develop the advanced productive forces without letup.
sentences.cn: 我们必须坚持不懈地发展先进的生产力.

sentences.en: You have been working at a brutal pace since mid-October and there's been no letup .
sentences.cn: 你自从十月中以后就一直在一个残忍的速度工作，而且已经没有停止。
